passives.name: Atrophy
passives.effects: {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} effects against {{tip|champions}} have a {{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=critical strike chance|0 to 100 for 11|0 to 100|formula=1% per 1% critical strike chance, capped at 100% critical strike chance}} chance to increase in duration by {{fd|0.25}} seconds (+ 33% of immobilizing effect's duration).
